title: Relationship goals: Ford tries to improve China ties
text:
Relationship goals: Ford tries to improve China ties   01:46 
After 20-odd years of ''marriage'' in China, Ford Motor Co is having relationship issues. The U.S. automaker, losing ground in the world's largest car market, is struggling to maintain trust and respect with its mainland Chinese partners, sources tell Reuters.
